title: Identify types of waves moving in medium

content.question: Two waves are created in air and move toward outer space. Wave X cannot travel in the vacuum of outer space, but wave Y can. What types of waves are X and Y ?

choices.label: Wave X Wave Y Electromagnetic Mechanical
Wave X Wave Y Electromagnetic Electromagnetic
Wave X Wave Y Mechanical Mechanical
Wave X Wave Y Mechanical Electromagnetic

content.answer: Wave X Wave Y Mechanical Electromagnetic

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
